official_title: A bill to authorize reduced postal rates during fiscal years 1985 and 1986 for parcels of food, medicine, or clothing sent to Poland or the Union of Soviet Socialist Republics.

summary.text: Authorizes reduced postal rates during FY 1985 and 1986 for parcels of food, medicine, or clothing sent to Poland or the Union of Soviet Socialist Republics.
